Html:
Hi,

I tried to look for potential answers to my question but didn't find anything on this forum. So here is my question:

can excel5 write data validations? If yes, what do I do wrong, because the drop down list never shows up. Here is my code:

$objValidation = $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getCellByColumnAndRow(4,34)->getDataValidation();
$objValidation->setType(PHPExcel_Cell_DataValidation::TYPE_LIST );
$objValidation->setAllowBlank(true);
$objValidation->setShowInputMessage(true);
$objValidation->setShowErrorMessage(true);
$objValidation->setShowDropDown(true);
$objValidation->setFormula1("=Yes,No");
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getCellByColumnAndRow(4,34)->setDataValidation($objValidation);

thank you very much in advance.
regards,
